heading: HR00342
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON WELFARE OF CHILDREN TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE ADVERSE EFFECTS OF CHARACTER-BASED VIDEO GAMES ON CHILDREN AND PRESCRIBE COUNTERMEASURES TO CURB, IF NOT DISCOURAGE YOUNGSTERS FROM ENGAGING IN SUCH CHARACTER-BASED VIDEO GAMES
status: Referred to the Technical Working Group (TWG) on 2020-03-02
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00342
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON WELFARE OF CHILDREN TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE ADVERSE EFFECTS OF CHARACTER-BASED VIDEO GAMES ON CHILDREN AND PRESCRIBE COUNTERMEASURES TO CURB, IF NOT DISCOURAGE YOUNGSTERS FROM ENGAGING IN SUCH CHARACTER-BASED VIDEO GAMES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MARCOLETA, RODANTE D.
DATE FILED : 2019-09-17
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for Meeting/Hearing on 2020-03-02
      2. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2020-03-02
      3. Referred to the Technical Working Group (TWG) on 2020-03-02
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WELFARE OF CHILDREN ON 2019-11-27
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2019-09-19;
